document_data.name: Bloodbriars
document_data.mainbody: '''Bloodbriars''' was an [[evocation]] spell that entangled a foe in unseen briars.
document_data.Effects: The spell created unseen but very sharp briars from magical energy, ensnaring the foe. It harmed them if they attempted to move or cast spells.
document_data.Component: The spell required a drop of blood.
document_data.History: The ''[[armathor]]s'' of [[Myth Drannor]] often used the ''bloodbriars'' spell to capture criminals.
